Text: Summer InternshipId like to thank you for the opportunity of letting me work here this summer Ive learned a lot in the past three months and hopefully have been of some help around here I was very impressed with this department and Enron itself and I really appreciate the chance for me to have worked in such an environment So anyway thank you and I wish you and the department well Brad
